elements.name: require(bool,string)(yieldConfigs[depositData.yieldConfigId].lockupTime <= block.timestamp - depositData.depositTime,Error: Minimum lockup time has not been met)

description:
CoinchainStaking.withdraw(uint256) (contracts/CoinchainStaking.sol#128-137) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(yieldConfigs[depositData.yieldConfigId].lockupTime <= block.timestamp - depositData.depositTime,Error: Minimum lockup time has not been met) (contracts/CoinchainStaking.sol#131)
markdown:

	- [require(bool,string)(yieldConfigs[depositData.yieldConfigId].lockupTime <= block.timestamp - depositData.depositTime,Error: Minimum lockup time has not been met)](contracts/CoinchainStaking.sol#L131)
